subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/BLESS_YOU-Original Audio-evp.wav 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Went with a friend and his wife out to 90 miles away from our home town to get a Boxer Pup from a Group that retrieved the pup (and others) from a puppy mill.  On our way back we stopped at a Truck Stop so some could use the restroom.            I went over to the picnic tables and then soon walked up to a big rock while recording for possible EVP's. I didn't think I would have much luck.  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/BLESS_YOU-Original%20Audio-evp.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/forms/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
